Products and Apps.title: PISSAR ATX
Products and Apps.description: Web + Android app provides map of Austin's accessible restrooms based on search criteria - location, handicap accessible, gender-neutral. Data collection is crowdsourced. In development.

Products and Apps.title: ungender.me
Products and Apps.description: ungender.me is a site + Android app for making text gender-neutral. View it here.

Products and Apps.title: MAL Updater
Products and Apps.description: Python script updates MyAnimeList.net user's 'Currently Watching' and 'Completed' lists based on specified directories. Will add it to my GitHub later.

Products and Apps.title: Mstr Crckr
Products and Apps.description: Open source, 3D printable Master Lock cracker with an Arduino, motor, encoder, and linear actuator - for educational purposes. Prototype stage.

Products and Apps.title: Lister
Products and Apps.description: Simple 'to do' list running on Heroku built with Flask, Angular, and a Postgres backend.

Products and Apps.title: Facebook Anonymizer
Products and Apps.description: Chrome Extension blogging tool anonymizes screenshots of Facebook content, blurring profile pictures and changing names to allow content sharing without privacy concerns. Useful for blogging, privacy concerts, etc. Facebook's code changes frequently, this might need an update. Install it here.

Products and Apps.title: CraigsList: Last Visited
Products and Apps.description: This Chrome Extension adds usability to CraigsList, enabling your browsing to be easier and faster. Install it here.

Products and Apps.title: Chrome to Cats
Products and Apps.description: This Chrome Extension makes The Internet a better place by replacing all images with cats. Install it here.

Products and Apps.title: Your New Tab Page
Products and Apps.description: This Chrome Extension allows you to customize your 'New Tab Page' in your browser to make it cleaner and more productive. I've stopped working on it, but you can install it here.

Products and Apps.title: Facebook Auto-Like Script
Products and Apps.description: Allows you to automatically 'like' posts on your wall on Facebook, and can match against words. Facebook's code changes frequently, this might need an update. Get it here.

JS Experiments.title: Dynamic Pie Chart Maker
JS Experiments.description: Allows you to make custom pie charts and download them as an image and data. View it here.

JS Experiments.title: Polar Clock - JS
JS Experiments.description: A Clock and calendar displayed using Polar Coordinates. View it here.

JS Experiments.title: Fractal Trees - JS
JS Experiments.description: Recursive fractal n-trees in JavaScript. View it here.

JS Experiments.title: Heighway Dragon Curve - JS
JS Experiments.description: Colorful Dragon Spiral implementation using JavaScript. View it here.

JS Experiments.title: Complete Graph - JS
JS Experiments.description: Complete Graph written in JavaScript. View it here.

JS Experiments.title: Pong - JS game for browsers
JS Experiments.description: Classic Pong game for your browser written in JavaScript. Play it here.

JS Experiments.title: Robots and Diamonds game for browsers
JS Experiments.description: Simple 2D game against a CPU. Play it here.

JS Experiments.title: Archimedes Spiral - JS
JS Experiments.description: Archimedes Spiral written in JavaScript. View it here.

JS Experiments.title: Lychrel Number Calculator
JS Experiments.description: Lychrel Number Calculator in JavaScript. View it here.

Websites.description: This is my online portfolio and resume.

Websites.title: Gay Bi Gay Gay - Site
Websites.description: Gay Bi Gay Gay is a queer music festival in Austin, TX that happens on the Last day of South By Southwest. I was really glad to volunteer to work with a great teammate on the WordPress site. View it here.

Websites.description: Website for the Robotics Club at UT. View it here.
